item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description:
Dude! No wonder you missed the last demolition party. I checked your blog before I sent you the invite, but I guess I must have missed this post.
So nothing equivalent to Fry's, eh? The *really* important question is, do they have a Mongolian BBQ anywhere nearby?
item.content:encoded:
Dude! No wonder you missed the last demolition party. I checked your blog before I sent you the invite, but I guess I must have missed this post.

So nothing equivalent to Fry’s, eh? The *really* important question is, do they have a Mongolian BBQ anywhere nearby?

item.title: By: George
item.dc:creator: George
item.description:
As someone who married a girl from Sac, I have much lamented the complete lack of anything in Utah even remotely close to the grandeur of Fry's Electronics. Best Buy is about as close as you're going to get. Sorry.
FWIW, there are some pretty good groups around here, from what I've heard. There is the Utah PHP Users' group: http://uphpu.org/
You can also check out the page for Provo Linux Users' Group, which has links to just about every other major group in the state: http://www.plug.org/
item.content:encoded:
As someone who married a girl from Sac, I have much lamented the complete lack of anything in Utah even remotely close to the grandeur of Fry’s Electronics. Best Buy is about as close as you’re going to get. Sorry.

FWIW, there are some pretty good groups around here, from what I’ve heard. There is the Utah PHP Users’ group: http://uphpu.org/

You can also check out the page for Provo Linux Users’ Group, which has links to just about every other major group in the state: http://www.plug.org/
